changeSet.author: patrick_schmitz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE datamanagement_process ( id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, uuid TEXT DEFAULT NULL, fk_object_type_id INTEGER DEFAULT 27 REFERENCES object_type (id), name TEXT(250) DEFAULT NULL, description TEXT(4000) DEFAULT NULL, tool TEXT(500) DEFAULT NULL, tool_version TEXT(250) DEFAULT NULL, routine TEXT(500) DEFAULT NULL );
changeSet.comment: New table object_persistence_method. Used objects: datamanagement_process Phabricator tasks: T159
